name: Sushi Academy
description:
Old Sushi Master runs a world-famous restaurant. His snacks are enjoyed by innumerable fans who would love to know the secrets of sushi making. However, few had the honor of being taught by the Master.

Take part in wonderful, relaxing play. Under the Master’s supervision, learn to chop vegetables, cut fish and decorate and serve meals. Create more and more complicated dishes. Who knows, maybe you will surpass your master some day?

Features

• Prepare meals, collect the ingredients and take the exams in the set of colorful minigames.
• Get to know the history, etiquette and rules of sushi making by reading the specially prepared sushipedia.
• Create dozens of exotic meals and admire the effects of your work.
• Broaden your skills and knowledge on one of the oldest culinary cultures of the world.
